next.excerpt: RecipeCart is a free extension that immediately shows you the recipe in a ready-for-print format. Print, save, or send the recipe to your phone. Under the hood, we use ML to identify exact ingredients + amounts for export to Instacart or Amazon Fresh.
next.title: Recipe Cart Chrome Extension - Instantly see recipe or order ingredients on any recipe site

localize.description: RecipeCart是一个免费的扩展，它可以立即以可供打印的格式向您显示食谱。打印、保存或将食谱发送到您的手机。在幕后，我们使用ML来确定出口到Insta或Amazon Fresh的确切配料+数量。
localize.tagline: 在任何食谱网站上即时查看食谱或订购食材

localize.description: RecipeCart是一個免費的擴展，它可以立即以可供打印的格式向您顯示食譜。打印、保存或將食譜發送到您的手機。在幕後，我們使用ML來確定出口到Insta或Amazon Fresh的確切配料+數量。
localize.tagline: 在任何食譜網站上即時查看食譜或訂購食材
